resources.string: Internet connection needed to complete this request
There was an error causing ACR Phone to crash and stop.\nPlease help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to is tap \'OK\' and send this report by email.
All permissions are required for full functionality
Cannot find any app to open this link
Tap on Allow to see and grant required permissions for call recording
Please turn on installation of unknown sources
There was and error. Would you like to try downloading manually?
Your phone may be preventing sideloading. Try installing, download and manually install with system file manager if fails

This service is used for accessing call audio. No call audio can be recorded when it is disabled. In order to limit access to your data, app limits observation to its own events and does not request any capability\n\nSome phones may report service as not working. Try disabling and enabling it again if this happens.
Tap here to enable Call Recording Helper
Please enable Call Recording Helper on Installed Accessibility Services screen
Call Recording Helper is not enabled
Google Play Store version ACR Phone is not installed or must be updated. This app can only be used together with a compatible version of ACR Phone
Must be kept running for call recording functionality of ACR Phone
This app must be update to function correctly
